summary: BigInt values in unclassified-rate response are not serialized, which can crash JSON responses.

issues.description: Response from /purpose-unclassified-rate is not passed through serializeBigInt, so if totalEntries or unclassifiedEntries are BigInt, res.json will throw.
issues.explanation: serializeBigInt safely converts BigInt values to strings for JSON transport, preventing runtime failures when BigInt fields are present.
